scripts.build: bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-windows-x64 --sourcemap ./src/core/run.ts --outfile build/odd-windows-x64;bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 --sourcemap ./src/core/run.ts --outfile build/odd-linux-x64;bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-arm64 --sourcemap ./src/core/run.ts --outfile build/odd-linux-arm64;bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64 --sourcemap ./src/core/run.ts --outfile build/odd-darwin-x64;bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --sourcemap ./src/core/run.ts --outfile build/odd-darwin-arm64
